thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 13 of 265
thread.title: Tamaira George
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Tamaira George

author: Tamaira George
title: Tamaira George
text: My promo code with Hellofresh did not work and they are refusing to refund my money unless I order another box. No thanks. That's not how customer service works. I am incredibly disappointed that a company would scam a customer like this and think they can trick them into another box. Never again will I purchase from this company.
